audioText: Ce patron méchant battu savamment par ses employés aimables découvre inévitablement que sa volonté de contrôler devient positivement contre-productive.
question: What does this mean boss beaten wisely by his kind employees inevitably discover?
options: That his will to control becomes positively counter-productive
That his company needs more technological innovation
That his marketing strategy requires complete reorganization
That his financial investments have been poorly managed
explanation: The text states 'Ce patron méchant battu savamment par ses employés aimables découvre inévitablement que sa volonté de contrôler devient positivement contre-productive' - This mean boss beaten wisely by his kind employees inevitably discovers that his will to control becomes positively counter-productive. 'Méchant' means mean/nasty, and 'aimables' means kind.
